oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bioenergy production in Finland - effects on growth, employment, and environment at regional level
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Simola, Antti
Kola, Jukka
Törmä, Hannu
Kinnunen, Jouko
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study is to assess the impacts of increasing bioenergy production on regional economies in Finland. The impacts on economic growth and employment in areas that are facing economic difficulties from other sources, e.g. down-scaling of more traditional industries, are of the main concern.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Simola, Antti; Kola, Jukka; Törmä, Hannu and Kinnunen, Jouko (2008) Bioenergy production in Finland - effects on growth, employment, and environment at regional level. Poster at: Risk assessment of global agrifood production chains - NJF's 90 year jubilee symposium : NJF seminar 410, Helsinki, Finland, 5-6 November 2008.
